display_long_description:
⭐ WELCOME TO PHANTOM PARK

Swing into a free spooky multiplayer VR playground for Meta Quest where you are a Swole who needs to turn on power generators before the Stalker gets you!

🥚 EGGS. EGGS. EGGS.

The first social VR playground to feature pets and eggs!

Hatch eggs into cute pets! Throw eggs and pets to thrash the Stalker and boost your movement. Hide your eggs in a nest to respawn. Don’t let anybody crush them! Throw pets to create platforms for thrilling escapes in a match, or to explore maps as a spectator.

💪 BECOME SWOLE

Games are defined by their community, and we need your feedback to grow. This is an Early Access version of the game that’s highly likely to change, and progress may not be saved for future releases or if you factory reset your device. We’re listening closely to players as we define the future of the game!

Join early… if you dare! 👻
